physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Large draining cysts, fluctuant nodules, pustules, and fibrotic scars distributed over the anterior and posterior trunk, buttocks, proximal area of the arms, and thighs. No sinus tracts were observed.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Initially presented with numerous cystic lesions. After starting isotretinoin, showed clinical improvement; however, flares of lesions occurred when dosage was decreased. Continued improvement noted with infliximab treatment.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Elevated triglycerides up to 489 mg/dL and total cholesterol up to 250 mg/dL during follow-ups.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Triglycerides and cholesterol levels normalized over the next 1 to 2 months after management adjustments.
